entry.tran: 不合法的;非法的;违反规则的
entry.def: If something is illegal, the law says that it is not allowed.

example.ex: It is illegal to intercept radio messages...
example.tran: 拦截无线电报是非法的。

example.ex: Birth control was illegal there until 1978...
example.tran: 1978 年以前那里节育是非法的。

entry.tran: (移民)非法入境的;(劳工)非法务工的
entry.def: Illegal immigrants or workers have travelled into a country or are working without official permission.
